info.title: Fast River Technologies FHIR Service API
info.description: FHIR Compliant and Streaming-Enabled REST API

servers.description: FHIR Resource Server: FHIR Resource Services On Premises or On Cloud

host.description: Host name where FHIR Resource Services Deployed

port.description: Port where FHIR Resource Services Deployed

get.description: Get CapabilityStatement Resource of the server

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: Mode: return information mode: full, normative or terminology

parameters.name: _format
parameters.description: FHIR Resource format, indicate the format of the returned resource (json/xml))

get.description: Search Patient Resource Using Query Parameters

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: FHIR Resource Type, the type of the resource to be retrieved, e.g. Patient

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: FHIR Resource Id, it is the logical ID of the resource, e.g. Patient MRN

parameters.name: _format
parameters.description: FHIR Resource format, indicate the format of the returned resource

parameters.name: _summary
parameters.description: _summary parameter requests the server to return a subset of the resource

default.description: FHIR DomainResource: Patient that satisfied query parameters

400.description: Bad request - Resource could not be parsed or failed basic FHIR validation rules

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: FHIR Resource Type, the type of the resource to be created, e.g. Patient

parameters.name: _format
parameters.description: FHIR Resource format, indicate the format of the returned resource

requestBody.description: FHIR Resource in json / xml string, json supported

400.description: Bad request - Resource could not be parsed or failed basic FHIR validation rules

404.description: Not found - Resource type not supported, or not a FHIR end-point

get.description: Get Patient Resource By Logical ID

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: FHIR Resource Type, the type of the resource to be retrieved, e.g. Patient

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: FHIR Resource Id, it is the logical ID of the resource, e.g. Patient MRN

parameters.name: _format
parameters.description: FHIR Resource format, indicate the format of the returned resource

parameters.name: _summary
parameters.description: _summary parameter requests the server to return a subset of the resource

400.description: Bad request - Resource could not be parsed or failed basic FHIR validation rules

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: FHIR Resource Type, the type of the resource to be updated, e.g. Patient

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: FHIR Resource Id, it is the logical ID of the resource, e.g. Patient MRN

parameters.name: _format
parameters.description: FHIR Resource format, indicate the format of the returned resource

requestBody.description: FHIR Resource in json / xml string, json supported

400.description: Bad request - Resource could not be parsed or failed basic FHIR validation rules

404.description: Not found - Resource type not supported, or not a FHIR end-point

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: FHIR Resource Type, the type of the resource to be deleted, e.g. Patient

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: FHIR Resource Id, it is the logical ID of the resource, e.g. Patient MRN

404.description: Not found - Resource with the given ID not found

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: FHIR Resource Type, the type of target resource, e.g. Patient

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: FHIR Resource Operation executed, the operation executed on the resource

parameters.name: _format
parameters.description: FHIR Resource format, indicate the format of the returned resource

requestBody.description: Operation Parameters: the parameters required to perform the operation.

get.description: Retrieve the history of a patient resource by its logical Id

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: FHIR Resource Type, the type of the resource to be retrieved of history, e.g. Patient

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: FHIR Resource Id, it is the logical ID of the resource, e.g. Patient MRN

parameters.name: _format
parameters.description: FHIR Resource format, indicate the format of the returned resource

default.description: FHIR DomainResource: Bundle of Resource History

post.description: Merge a source domain resource with the sourceId to a target domain resource with the targetId..

requestBody.description: FHIR Parameters resource specifying source and target patients to be merged

default.description: FHIR DomainResource: Bundle a Set of Merged Domain Resource and Survived Domain Resource

400.description: Bad request - Resource could not be parsed or failed basic FHIR validation rules

post.description: Match domain resource with golden domain resources in the MPI database based on the MPI provider.

parameters.name: _format
parameters.description: FHIR Resource format, indicate the format of the returned resource

requestBody.description: FHIR Resource in json / xml string, json supported

default.description: FHIR DomainResource: Bundle Contains A Set of Matched Golden Domain Resources or Potentially Matched Records

400.description: Bad request - Resource could not be parsed or failed basic FHIR validation rules

post.summary: Probabilistic search golden domain resources based on search criteria and options
post.description: Probabilistic search golden domain resources based on search criteria and options.

parameters.name: _format
parameters.description: FHIR Resource format, indicate the format of the returned resource

requestBody.description: FHIR Resource in json / xml string, json supported

default.description: FHIR DomainResource: Bundle contains a set of matched golden domain resources with score above the match threshold

parameters.name: _format
parameters.description: FHIR Resource format, indicate the format of the returned resource

requestBody.description: FHIR Resource in json / xml string, json supported

default.description: FHIR DomainResource: Bundle a set of merged domain resource and survived domain resource

post.description:
Link two domain resources,  FHIR link operation is global merge or enterprise merge 
 in MPI perspective, but does not perform local merge or domain resource merge.

parameters.name: _format
parameters.description: FHIR Resource format, indicate the format of the returned resource

requestBody.description: FHIR Resource in json / xml string, json supported

default.description: FHIR DomainResource: Bundle of A Set of Linked Domain Resources

202.description: Has Been Linked, Resources Has Been Linked

400.description: Bad request - Resource could not be parsed or failed basic FHIR validation rules

parameters.name: _format
parameters.description: FHIR Resource format, indicate the format of the returned resource

requestBody.description: FHIR Resource in json / xml string, json supported

default.description: FHIR DomainResource: Bundle of A Set Of Source Domain Resource And target Domain Resource

400.description: Bad request - Resource could not be parsed or failed basic FHIR validation rules

get.summary: Retrieve potential duplicates for the given patient identifier
get.description: Retrieve potential duplicates for the given patient identifier.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: FHIR Resource Id, it is the logical ID of the resource, e.g. Patient MRN

parameters.name: _format
parameters.description: FHIR Resource format, indicate the format of the returned resource

default.description: FHIR DomainResource: Bundle a set of potential duplicate patient resources

parameters.name: _format
parameters.description: FHIR Resource format, indicate the format of the returned resource

requestBody.description: FHIR Resource in json / xml string, json supported

default.description: FHIR DomainResource: Bundle a Set of Potential Duplicate Patient Resources

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: FHIR Resource Type, the type of the resource to be retrieved, e.g. Patient

parameters.description: _summary parameter requests the server to return a subset of the resource

default.description: FHIR DomainResource: Patient that satisfied query parameters

post.description: Get Patient Resource By Logical ID

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: FHIR Resource Type, the type of the resource to be retrieved, e.g. Patient

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: FHIR Resource Id, it is the logical ID of the resource, e.g. Patient MRN

parameters.name: _format

400.description: Bad request - Resource could not be parsed or failed basic FHIR validation rules

get.description: Retrieve the resource version by its logical Id and version id

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: FHIR Resource Type, the type of the resource to be read, e.g. Patient

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: FHIR Resource Id, it is the logical ID of the resource, e.g. Patient MRN

parameters.name: vid
parameters.description: FHIR Resource Version Id, it is version id the resource, e.g. 1, 3, 5, 6

parameters.name: _format
parameters.description: FHIR Resource format, indicate the format of the returned resource bundle

default.description: FHIR DomainResource: Bundle of resource versions by its logical Id and version id
